option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Shadow Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#0D000000"/> <!-- 5% black shadow (0D in hex = 5% opacity) --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Main Background Layer, shifted slightly to create shadow effect --> <item android:top="2dp" android:bottom="2dp"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Base Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Aura Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#1E000000"/> <!-- 10% black aura --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Base Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@color/icon_backround"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Aura Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="#1E000000"/> <!-- 10% black aura --> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> <!-- Border Layer --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <stroke android:width="1dp" android:color="@color/icon_text"/> <corners android:radius="0dp"/> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/appTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="false" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:padding="7dp" android:text="@string/app_title" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/appTitle">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/itemPoster" android:layout_height="250dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:src="@drawable/loading" android:background="@color/white" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:src="@drawable/burger_double" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:text="@string/item_title_placeholder" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="35sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemPoster" tools:text="Double Cheeseburger" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:maxLines="5" android:text="Description" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="25sp" android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemTitle" tools:text="Two beef patties with double cheese and special sauce." />
<TextView android:id="@+id/minusButton" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:background="@drawable/minus_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/tomato_red" android:layout_marginEnd="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/itemCounter"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemCounter" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="65sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:text="1" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/plusButton" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/minusButton" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/plusButton" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="50dp" android:background="@drawable/plus_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/lettuce_green" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/itemCounter" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemPrice" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:contentDescription="@string/item_price" android:text="0.00â‚¬" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemDescription" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="11.99â‚¬" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/itemNotes" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="110dp" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:text="Notes.." android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="top|start" android:textSize="25sp" android:textStyle="normal" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemPrice" />
<!-- <ImageView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/favoriteIcon"--> <!-- android:layout_width="40dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="40dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="10dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginEnd="27dp"--> <!-- android:contentDescription="@string/favorite_icon"--> <!-- android:src="@drawable/ic_favorite_unselected"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/posterCard" />--> <!----> <!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemReleaseDate"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="20dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/release_date_placeholder"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/accent"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemGenre"--> <!-- tools:text="May 27, 2022" />--> <!----> <!-- <RatingBar--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemRating"--> <!-- style="@style/Widget.AppCompat.RatingBar.Small"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="5dp"--> <!-- android:numStars="5"--> <!-- android:progressBackgroundTint="#FFFFFF"--> <!-- android:progressTint="#FFEB3B"--> <!-- android:stepSize="1"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemReleaseDate" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemRuntimeTitle"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="25dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/runtime_title"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/secondary"--> <!-- android:textSize="20sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRating" />--> <!----> <!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemRuntime"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="5dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/unknown_runtime"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/accent"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRuntimeTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="2h 10m" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemDescriptionTitle"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="25dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/description_title"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/secondary"--> <!-- android:textSize="20sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRuntime" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemDescription"--> <!-- android:layout_width="360dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="5dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginEnd="15dp"--> <!-- android:ellipsize="end"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:maxLines="5"--> <!-- android:text="@string/no_description"--> <!-- android:textColor="#FFFFFF"--> <!-- android:textSize="13sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="normal"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemDescriptionTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him." />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemCastTitle"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="25dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/cast_title"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/secondary"--> <!-- android:textSize="20sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemDescription" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/itemCast"--> <!-- android:layout_width="360dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="5dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginEnd="15dp"--> <!-- android:ellipsize="end"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:maxLines="3"--> <!-- android:text="@string/no_cast"--> <!-- android:textColor="#FFFFFF"--> <!-- android:textSize="13sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemCastTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="Tom Cruise, Miles Teller, Jennifer Connelly" />-->
<!-- <LinearLayout--> <!-- android:id="@+id/reviewsLayout"--> <!-- android:layout_width="match_parent"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginStart="15dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="25dp"--> <!-- android:layout_marginEnd="15dp"--> <!-- android:orientation="vertical"--> <!-- android:visibility="gone"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemCast">-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/reviewsTitle"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:text="@string/reviews_title"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/secondary"--> <!-- android:textSize="20sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- tools:text="Reviews" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/firstReviewer"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="15dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/accent"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRuntimeTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="Reviewer" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/firstReview"--> <!-- android:layout_width="360dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:ellipsize="end"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:maxLines="3"--> <!-- android:textColor="#FFFFFF"--> <!-- android:textSize="13sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="normal"--> <!-- tools:text="This item was absolutely fantastic! The action sequences were breathtaking and the performances were top-notch." />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/secondReviewer"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="15dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/accent"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRuntimeTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="Reviewer" />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/secondReview"--> <!-- android:layout_width="360dp"--> <!-- android:layout_height="match_parent"--> <!-- android:ellipsize="end"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:maxLines="3"--> <!-- android:textColor="#FFFFFF"--> <!-- android:textSize="13sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="normal"--> <!-- tools:text="This item was absolutely fantastic! The action sequences were breathtaking and the performances were top-notch." />-->
<!-- <TextView--> <!-- android:id="@+id/thirdReviewer"--> <!-- android:layout_width="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_height="wrap_content"--> <!-- android:layout_marginTop="15dp"--> <!-- android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium"--> <!-- android:textColor="@color/accent"--> <!-- android:textSize="15sp"--> <!-- android:textStyle="bold"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"--> <!-- app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemRuntimeTitle"--> <!-- tools:text="Reviewer" />-->

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</ScrollView>
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/default_backround">
<TextView android:id="@+id/appTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@color/icon_text" android:clickable="false" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:padding="7dp" android:text="@string/app_title" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/backArrowButton" android:layout_width="40dp" android:layout_height="40dp" android:background="@drawable/baseline_arrow_back_24" android:backgroundTint="@color/white" android:clickable="true" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" />
<ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp" android:fillViewport="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/appTitle">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/itemPoster" android:layout_height="250dp" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:src="@drawable/loading" android:background="@color/white" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:src="@drawable/burger_double" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemTitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:text="@string/item_title_placeholder" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="35sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemPoster" tools:text="Double Cheeseburger" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemDescription" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:ellipsize="end" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:maxLines="5" android:text="Description" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="25sp" android:textStyle="italic" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemTitle" tools:text="Two beef patties with double cheese and special sauce." />
<TextView android:id="@+id/minusButton" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="50dp" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:background="@drawable/minus_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/tomato_red" android:layout_marginEnd="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/itemCounter"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemCounter" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="60dp" android:textAlignment="center" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="65sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:text="1" app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/plusButton" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/minusButton" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/plusButton" android:layout_width="75dp" android:layout_height="75dp" android:layout_marginBottom="50dp" android:background="@drawable/plus_button" android:backgroundTint="@color/lettuce_green" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/itemCounter" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/itemPrice" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="15dp" android:layout_marginTop="15dp" android:contentDescription="@string/item_price" android:text="0.00â‚¬" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="40sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemDescription" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" tools:text="11.99â‚¬" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/itemNotes" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="110dp" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_marginTop="20dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" android:hint="Notes.." android:textColorHint="@color/icon_text" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:gravity="top|start" android:textSize="25sp" android:textStyle="normal" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemPrice" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/submitNotes" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="40dp" android:layout_marginTop="10dp" android:layout_marginEnd="15dp" android:background="@drawable/edit_text_backround" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:gravity="center" android:paddingStart="20dp" android:paddingEnd="20dp" android:text="Submit" android:textColor="@color/icon_text" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/itemNotes" />

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/my_graph" app:startDestination="@id/openingFragment"> <fragment android:id="@+id/openingFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.openScreen.OpeningFragment" android:label="OpeningFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_opening"> <action android:id="@+id/action_openingFragment_to_itemListFragment" app:destination="@id/itemListFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/itemListFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.homeScreen.ItemListFragment" android:label="ItemListFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_item_list"> <action android:id="@+id/action_itemListFragment_to_cartFragment" app:destination="@id/cartFragment" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_itemListFragment_to_itemDetailsFragment" app:destination="@id/itemDetailsFragment" /> </fragment> <fragment android:id="@+id/cartFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.checkoutScreen.CartFragment" android:label="CartFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_cart"/> <fragment android:id="@+id/itemDetailsFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.detailsScreen.ItemDetailsFragment" android:label="ItemDetailsFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_item_details"/> </navigation>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/my_graph" app:startDestination="@id/openingFragment"> <fragment android:id="@+id/openingFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.openScreen.OpeningFragment" android:label="OpeningFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_opening"> <action android:id="@+id/action_openingFragment_to_itemListFragment" app:destination="@id/itemListFragment" /> </fragment>
<fragment android:id="@+id/itemListFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.homeScreen.ItemListFragment" android:label="ItemListFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_item_list"> <action android:id="@+id/action_itemListFragment_to_cartFragment" app:destination="@id/cartFragment" /> <action android:id="@+id/action_itemListFragment_to_itemDetailsFragment" app:destination="@id/itemDetailsFragment" /> </fragment> <fragment android:id="@+id/cartFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.checkoutScreen.CartFragment" android:label="CartFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_cart"/> <fragment android:id="@+id/itemDetailsFragment" android:name="gr.android.softposecr.ui.detailsScreen.ItemDetailsFragment" android:label="ItemDetailsFragment" tools:layout="@layout/fragment_item_details"> <argument android:name="ITEM_TITLE" app:argType="string" /> <argument android:name="ITEM_DESCRIPTION" app:argType="string" /> <argument android:name="ITEM_IMAGE" app:argType="integer" /> <argument android:name="ITEM_PRICE" app:argType="float" android:defaultValue="0.0" /> </fragment> </navigation>
